DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `eratysettings`

CREATE TABLE `eratysettings` ( `ideratysettings` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `numersklepu` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `wariantsklepu` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `typproduktu` int(2) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `char` varchar(5) DEFAULT NULL, `paymentmethodid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `adddate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `editid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `editdate` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ideratysettings`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
ALTER TABLE `order` ADD COLUMN `sessionid` varchar(255) NOT NULL AFTER `rulescartid`

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ceneo
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS integration

CREATE TABLE `integration` ( `idintegration` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `symbol` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `addid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `adddate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `editid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `editdate` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `installed` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `updateurl` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `md5check` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `relationtable` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `datatable` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `storeid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `viewid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `parentid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idintegration`), UNIQUE KEY `UNIQUE_integration_symbol` (`symbol`), UNIQUE KEY `UNIQUE_integration_name` (`name`), KEY `FK_integration_addid` (`addid`), KEY `FK_integration_editid` (`editid`), KEY `FK_integration_storeid` (`storeid`), KEY `FK_integration_viewid` (`viewid`), KEY `FK_integration_parentid` (`parentid`), CONSTRAINT `FK_integration_addid` FOREIGN KEY (`addid`) REFERENCES `user` (`iduser`), CONSTRAINT `FK_integration_editid` FOREIGN KEY (`editid`) REFERENCES `user` (`iduser`), CONSTRAINT `FK_integration_parentid` FOREIGN KEY (`parentid`) REFERENCES `integration` (`idintegration`), CONSTRAINT `FK_integration_storeid` FOREIGN KEY (`storeid`) REFERENCES `store` (`idstore`), CONSTRAINT `FK_integration_viewid` FOREIGN KEY (`viewid`) REFERENCES `view` (`idview`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `orderfiles` ( `idorderfiles` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `orderid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `adddate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `path` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idorderfiles`), KEY `FK_orderfiles_orderid` (`orderid`), CONSTRAINT `FK_orderfiles_orderid` FOREIGN KEY (`orderid`) REFERENCES `order` (`idorder`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

ALTER TABLE `view` ADD COLUMN `uploaderenabled` INT UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER `enablerss` , ADD COLUMN `uploadmaxfilesize` DECIMAL(15,0) NULL DEFAULT '10' AFTER `uploaderenabled` , ADD COLUMN `uploadchunksize` DECIMAL(15,0) NULL DEFAULT 100 AFTER `uploadmaxfilesize` , ADD COLUMN `uploadextensions` TEXT NULL AFTER `uploadchunksize`

ALTER TABLE `view` ADD COLUMN `invoicedefaultpaymentdue` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 7 AFTER `invoicenumerationkind`
DROP TABLE `invoice`

CREATE TABLE `invoice` ( `idinvoice` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `symbol` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `invoicedate` date NOT NULL, `salesdate` date NOT NULL, `paymentduedate` date NOT NULL, `salesperson` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `invoicetype` int(11) NOT NULL, `comment` text, `contentoriginal` longblob NOT NULL, `contentcopy` longblob NOT NULL, `orderid` int(11) NOT NULL, `totalpayed` decimal(15,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `viewid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idinvoice`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
ALTER TABLE `dispatchmethodweight` ADD COLUMN `vat` INT UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `editdata`
ALTER TABLE `product` DROP COLUMN `description` , DROP COLUMN `shortdescription`
DROP TABLE `exchangeentityfield`
DROP TABLE `exchangeentitytype`
ALTER TABLE `categorytranslation` CHANGE COLUMN `description` `shortdescription` VARCHAR(3000) NULL DEFAULT NULL
ALTER TABLE `categorytranslation` ADD COLUMN `description` VARCHAR(3000) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `shortdescription`
UPDATE `categorytranslation` SET description = shortdescription
ALTER TABLE `category` ADD COLUMN `enable` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER `editdate`
ALTER TABLE `product` ADD COLUMN `enable` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER `trackstock`

CREATE TABLE `globalsettings` ( `idglobalsettings` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `param` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `value` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idglobalsettings`), UNIQUE KEY `UNIQUE_globalsettings_param_type` (`param`,`type`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
ALTER TABLE `productattributeset` ADD COLUMN `symbol` VARCHAR(128) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `attributeprice`
INSERT INTO globalsettings SET param = 'datagrid_rows_per_page', value = '50', type = 'interface'
INSERT INTO globalsettings SET param = 'datagrid_show_context_menu', value = '0', type = 'interface'
INSERT INTO globalsettings SET param = 'datagrid_click_row_action', value = 'edit', type = 'interface'

CREATE TABLE `event` ( `idevent` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `model` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `method` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `module` varchar(64) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idevent`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
INSERT INTO event SET name = 'admin.product.add', model = 'productsearch', method = 'addProductToSearch', module = 'Gekosale'
INSERT INTO event SET name = 'admin.product.edit', model = 'productsearch', method = 'addProductToSearch', module = 'Gekosale'
ALTER TABLE `layoutbox` ADD COLUMN `controller` VARCHAR(128) NULL AFTER `content`

UPDATE layoutbox SET controller = (SELECT LBCT.controller FROM layoutboxcontenttype LBCT LEFT JOIN layoutboxcontenttypevalue LBCTV ON LBCT.idlayoutboxcontenttype = LBCTV.layoutboxcontenttypeid WHERE LBCTV.layoutboxid = layoutbox.idlayoutbox)
DROP TABLE `layoutboxcontenttypevalue`
DROP TABLE `layoutboxcontenttype`
DROP TABLE `layoutboxcontenttype`
INSERT INTO controller SET name = 'producerlist', version = 1, description = 'TXT_CONTROLLER_PRODUCERLIST', enable = 1, addid = 1, mode = 0
INSERT INTO subpage SET name = 'Producerlist', description = 'Lista produktów producenta', translation = 'TXT_PRODUCER_LIST'
INSERT INTO `subpagelayout` SET subpageid = (SELECT idsubpage FROM subpage WHERE name = 'Producerlist'), viewid = NULL
ALTER TABLE `producertranslation` ADD COLUMN `seo` VARCHAR(255) NULL AFTER `www`
INSERT INTO controllerseo SET name = 'producent', languageid = 1, addid = 1, controllerid = (SELECT idcontroller FROM controller WHERE name = 'producerlist')
ALTER TABLE `producertranslation` DROP COLUMN `www`

ALTER TABLE `currency` ADD COLUMN `decimalseparator` VARCHAR(10) NULL AFTER `currencysymbol` , ADD COLUMN `thousandseparator` VARCHAR(10) NULL AFTER `decimalseparator` , ADD COLUMN `positivepreffix` VARCHAR(10) NULL AFTER `thousandseparator` , ADD COLUMN `positivesuffix` VARCHAR(10) NULL AFTER `positivepreffix` , ADD COLUMN `negativepreffix` VARCHAR(10) NULL AFTER `positivesuffix` , ADD COLUMN `negativesuffix` VARCHAR(10) NULL AFTER `negativepreffix` , ADD COLUMN `decimalcount` INT NULL AFTER `negativesuffix`
UPDATE currency SET positivesuffix = currencysymbol, negativepreffix = '-', negativesuffix = currencysymbol, decimalcount = 2,decimalseparator = '.'
ALTER TABLE `file` DROP COLUMN `parentid` , DROP COLUMN `storeid`
ALTER TABLE `view` ADD COLUMN `favicon` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `photoid`
ALTER TABLE `missingcart` DROP FOREIGN KEY `FK_missingcart_storeid` , DROP FOREIGN KEY `FK_missingcart_parentid`
ALTER TABLE `missingcart` DROP COLUMN `parentid` , DROP COLUMN `storeid`, DROP INDEX `FK_missingcart_parentid`, DROP INDEX `FK_missingcart_storeid`

CREATE TABLE `productgroupprice` ( `idproductgroupprice` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `clientgroupid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `productid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `groupprice` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `sellprice` decimal(15,4) NOT NULL, `promotion` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `discountprice` decimal(15,4) DEFAULT NULL, `promotionstart` date DEFAULT NULL, `promotionend` date DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idproductgroupprice`), UNIQUE KEY `UNIQUE_productgroupprice_productid_clientgroupid` (`clientgroupid`,`productid`), KEY `FK_productgroupprice_productid` (`productid`), KEY `FK_productgroupprice_clientgroupid` (`clientgroupid`), CONSTRAINT `FK_productgroupprice_clientgroupid` FOREIGN KEY (`clientgroupid`) REFERENCES `clientgroup` (`idclientgroup`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `FK_productgroupprice_productid` FOREIGN KEY (`productid`) REFERENCES `product` (`idproduct`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

ALTER TABLE `product` ADD COLUMN `promotion` INT UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER `enable` , ADD COLUMN `discountprice` DECIMAL(15,4) NULL DEFAULT 0.0000 AFTER `promotion` , ADD COLUMN `promotionstart` DATE NULL AFTER `discountprice` , ADD COLUMN `promotionend` DATE NULL AFTER `promotionstart`
ALTER TABLE `productattributeset` ADD COLUMN `discountprice` DECIMAL(15,4) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `attributeprice`

CREATE TABLE `staticgroup` ( `idstaticgroup` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `addid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `adddate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`idstaticgroup`), KEY `FK_staticgroup_addid` (`addid`), CONSTRAINT `FK_staticgroup_addid` FOREIGN KEY (`addid`) REFERENCES `user` (`iduser`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `staticgrouptranslation` ( `idstaticgrouptranslation` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `staticgroupid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `languageid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idstaticgrouptranslation`), UNIQUE KEY `UNIQUE_staticgrouptranslation_name_languageid_staticgroupid` (`name`,`languageid`,`staticgroupid`), KEY `FK_staticgrouptranslation_languageid` (`languageid`), CONSTRAINT `FK_staticgrouptranslation_languageid` FOREIGN KEY (`languageid`) REFERENCES `language` (`idlanguage`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC

CREATE TABLE `staticattribute` ( `idstaticattribute` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `staticgroupid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `addid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `adddate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`idstaticattribute`), KEY `FK_staticattribute_addid` (`addid`), CONSTRAINT `FK_staticattribute_addid` FOREIGN KEY (`addid`) REFERENCES `user` (`iduser`), KEY `FK_staticattribute_staticgroupid` (`staticgroupid`), CONSTRAINT `FK_staticattribute_staticgroupid` FOREIGN KEY (`staticgroupid`) REFERENCES `staticgroup` (`idstaticgroup`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `staticattributetranslation` ( `idstaticattributetranslation` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `staticattributeid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `languageid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idstaticattributetranslation`), KEY `FK_staticattributetranslation_languageid` (`languageid`), CONSTRAINT `FK_staticattributetranslation_languageid` FOREIGN KEY (`languageid`) REFERENCES `language` (`idlanguage`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC
